metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21838 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple exploitable integer overflow vulnerabilities exist within theMPEG-4 decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Contentlibrary v1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input can cause an integeroverflow due to unchecked arithmetic resulting in a heap-based bufferoverflow that causes memory corruption. An attacker can convince a user toopen a video to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
